original_title: My Heart Beats So That I Can Hardly Speak
overview: Seeing What Was Before Me Took My Breath Away, I Stood In The Moonlight, The Glow Was Blinding, As The Wind Bellowed I Felt In That Solitary Moment Like I Never Have Before And When They Lined The Streets To Spit At Me I Could Look Up To The Sky And See The End Knowing That My Final Moments Were Spent In The Presence Of Overwhelming Beauty.
title: My Heart Beats So That I Can Hardly Speak
